overview: They say you never really get over your first love. As such, the Thornhill lesbian community is filled with broken hearts - and troubled minds. It seems some girls will do anything to revisit the pleasure of the past - even if it destroys the present. When two voluptuous female doctors return to Thornhill under a cloud of mystery, the stage is set for manipulation, lust, and destruction. And lots of hot, lesbian sex.
title: Lesbian Psychotherapists 1
